column1: All 3 major indexes hit all-time highs. Dow has 7th straight record day
Secretary of State Rex Tillerson presides over an abrupt shakeup at the State Department.
Senate confirms Scott Pruitt to lead EPA. He has vowed to curb the agency’s regulatory reach once in office
Malaysia says it won't release body of Kim Jong Un's half-brother to North Korea without DNA from the Kim family.
Mike Dubke expected to be named as White House Communications Director
Retired Vice Admiral Bob Harward has turned down Trump's offer to be national security adviser
